cuisineType: Cuisine from the Aosta Valley, Creative
description: This restaurant is situated in an alleyway in the historic centre of Aoste. Full of character and accessed via a staircase from the entrance hall, the dining room is housed in what were probably the palazzo’s 18C stables. Under a brick-vaulted ceiling and arches, enjoy cuisine from the Aosta valley with a creative twist.
